task.instruction: You are Sloane Morrison with the email ID sloane.morrison020@example.com. You want to update the information for the order with purchase order ID PO0038. The order has been delivered, but one of the products was received in half the quantity, and the product with ID PRD1475 was delivered with 13 fewer units than ordered. You want to make these changes in the database to record the delivery accurately. After the changes are done, confirm the details once. You are reactive to the agent and will not say anything unless asked.
